name: but-skill-tier4-eval
description: Tier 4 integration evaluation harness for the GitButler but CLI skill

scripts.eval: pnpm run build && cargo build -p but --manifest-path ../../../../Cargo.toml && promptfoo eval -c promptfooconfig.yaml
scripts.eval:repeat: pnpm run build && cargo build -p but --manifest-path ../../../../Cargo.toml && promptfoo eval -c promptfooconfig.yaml --repeat 3
scripts.eval:codex: pnpm run build && cargo build -p but --manifest-path ../../../../Cargo.toml && BUT_EVAL_AGENT=codex BUT_EVAL_RUNNER=providers/codex-local.sh BUT_EVAL_RUNNER_BIN=codex BUT_EVAL_MODEL=${BUT_EVAL_MODEL:-gpt-5-codex} promptfoo eval -c promptfooconfig.yaml
scripts.eval:codex:repeat: pnpm run build && cargo build -p but --manifest-path ../../../../Cargo.toml && BUT_EVAL_AGENT=codex BUT_EVAL_RUNNER=providers/codex-local.sh BUT_EVAL_RUNNER_BIN=codex BUT_EVAL_MODEL=${BUT_EVAL_MODEL:-gpt-5-codex} promptfoo eval -c promptfooconfig.yaml --repeat 3
